Cheap Apartments in Paris

Why not live like a local by choosing one of our fantastic selection of cheap apartments in Paris? Enjoy shopping for ingredients at neighbourhood markets and supermarkets, prepare delicious meals in your own kitchen, and relax on the sofa in your own cosy sitting room. Apartments offer more space and more freedom – and they are usually a very pocket-friendly option, particularly when you’re travelling in a group or with the family. Our team of experts have selected inexpensive self-catering studios and apartments across the city, from the Latin Quarter to the Marais, and from Montmartre to the Champs-Élysées. Don’t miss out – find your home from home in Paris now!
